General.Name: General Plastic Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: General Plastic Industrial Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and markets copier and laser printer toner cartridges, and related peripheral products in Taiwan. The company also offers organic photoconductive drum gears; and toner filling and packaging design, project management, and logistics services. It serves the medical, automotive electronics, microelectronics, micro/fiber optics, and emerging technologies industries. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
